code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountDetail=()=>{const{id,acc_id}=useParams();const[account,setAccount]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{api.get(`/users/${id}/accounts/${acc_id}`).then(response=>setAccount(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[id,acc_id]);if(!account)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Account Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Account ID:"})," ",account.acc_id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Total Credit:"})," ",account.totalCredit]})]});};export default AccountDetail;
